title: Provides for eligibility for coverage under the New York state health insurance program for after-adopted children of unremarried spouses of deceased employees
summary: Provides for eligibility for coverage under the New York State Health Insurance Program for after-adopted children of unremarried spouses of employees of the state or participating employers; defines "dependent" to include such children.
